data.title: Fresno Unified School District
data.text:
Join Fresno Unified's dynamic Career Technical Education (CTE) program, where over 900 business and industry partners collaborate to offer unparalleled real-world learning experiences. Unlock your potential as you immerse yourself in hands-on curriculum, expert instruction, and exciting work-based opportunities. Here, you'll cultivate creativity, adaptability, and problem-solving skills, empowering you to become a leader in your community and beyond. Explore endless possibilities with Fresno Unified CTE today!

Career Technical Education

Pathway Programs

The greatest joy in my job is related to students – seeing their growth and hearing about their successes in academics, sports or extracurricular activities. Learning about their successes later on as they attend college and/or move into a career also makes me smile.

My favorite part of my job is my ability to communicate with families whose primary language is not English.

I wanted all students to see it (school's welcome mural) as they entered our school, knowing that they are valued and we are here for them.

I really enjoy seeing their growth over the years, seeing them come out of their shells. That’s my joy of doing the job – that transformation!
